Name: War Trigger 3
About the game: Compete with friends or players from around the globe using some of the world's deadliest modern weapons and vehicles. Play with up to 24 players in unique arenas designed for infantry, vehicle, and air combat. Game Modes: - Search and Destroy - Territories - Conquer - Survivor - Team Deathmatch: Resources 'TDR' - Team Deathmatch: Armored 'TDA'
